snippet.title: Ford vs Chevy - PlayStation 2 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Unlike the other Ford Racing games on the PlayStation 2, Ford vs Chevy is NOT a published by Empire Interactive, who had attached their name to the Ford Racing game series since the very first game on PC and PSone. And Razorworks was not involved with this one, either. Instead, this was published by Global Star Software (a division of Take Two Interactive) and developed by Eutechnyx, who was far better known for Ride To Hell: Retribution. It was also the first (and only) Ford Racing game on the PS2 to actually support online multiplayer via GameSpy. But unfortunately, both GameSpy and PS2 online multiplayer in general were both shut down a long time ago.

Ford vs Chevy (C) Take Two Interactive
Also released on Xbox

#ford #fordvschevy #fordracing #ps2 #playstation2 #retrogames #retrogaming #globalstarsoftware #eutechnyx
